name: Zombears
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 44 (My First Ludum Dare)

Vote for my game here! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/zombears-1

Theme: Your life is currency

Defend your stuffing while fighting zombie bears!

If you want to upgrade your bear to protect his stuffing, you have to pay the shopkeeper with some stuffing.

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Interact with Shop, or pick up heals (Green Stuffing)

Left Click: Shoot

To Upgrade:

Go to bottom of shop, walk to it with player, and press E.
